data.name: Fastest Finger First: A. Maid B. Lieutenant Colonel C. Little Devil
data.short_description: As Mari and Kouzuki Yuki are working at their part-time job in Akihabara to earn money for a buzzer set, Shiki and Inoue arrive in the area to train themselves with a quiz bowl game in the arcade. They're battling against a player called "Second Lieutenant Chisato" when Ashiya shows up, and the...

English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
